title: Convenient Malpensa Business Stay Only 45 Minutes from Milan
description: Enjoy everything you need for a comfortable stay at Crowne Plaza Milan - Malpensa Airport, an IHG Hotel. Whether you're travelling for business or pleasure, it's easy to lose yourself in the Italian lifestyle in this charming city, famous for its fashion, culture and cuisine. Explore the cobblestone streets of smaller neighbouring towns or take a day trip to gorgeous Lake Como, before returning to your conveniently located hotel, equipped with onsite dining, business centre and gym.
